channel.title: appcast-lab changelog
channel.description: Most recent changes with links to updates.

item.title: Version 2.0
item.description:
What's New

  • Updated the version number to v1.0

    • Minimum System Requirements

  • Xcode 7.3 or greater for compiling
  • OS X 10.11 for compiling and running

    • Contact Me

    If you encountered any issue, you can:
  • Email me: contact@tong-kuo.me
  • If you are using S/MIME, you can send me encrypted email by retrieving my S/MIME certificate and its related intermediate certificates in here
  • If you are using GnuPG, you can send me encrypted email, my GnuPG pub key is on the Keybase.io

item.title: Version 1.0
item.description:
What's New

  • Updated the version number to v1.0

    • Minimum System Requirements

  • Xcode 7.3 or greater for compiling
  • OS X 10.11 for compiling and running

    • Contact Me

    If you encountered any issue, you can:
  • Email me: contact@tong-kuo.me
  • If you are using S/MIME, you can send me encrypted email by retrieving my S/MIME certificate and its related intermediate certificates in here
  • If you are using GnuPG, you can send me encrypted email, my GnuPG pub key is on the Keybase.io
